verbose_text: To test whether BzATP attenuates LDH release, as predicted from the oocyte expression data described above, we stimulated WT astrocytes for 2 hr with elevated [K +] o ACSF and determined the release of LDH in the absence and presence of BzATP (30 and 300 muM).
evidence: attenuates LDH release, as predicted from the oocyte expression data described above, we stimulated WT astrocytes for 2 hr
